doesn't work in hardy: well first of all, it's 1280x1024, and like I said, the only way I got it working was by installing gutsy, installing the ubuntu-provided restricted drivers, then copying the file /etc/X11/xorg.conf to some other location.  Then I installed hardy and copied my saved xorg.conf over my new one.
probably your xorg.conf needs edited for the highr resolutions
